text: Hi.
hello
Do you want to donate 5 cents to Save the Children?
no, I have no interest in making any donations.
Alright, no problem.
I am not sure what they expect here.  Multiple requests for money until someone says yes or no and then what?
Sounds like 10 chat turns (probably apiece).
It seems like a one question and answer item to me.
Yeah, if I was passionate about the cause, maybe a two question, but I can't back a cause I don't believe in.
The cause is the only cause I might donate to but if I were to donate, it would not be from a survey.
Yeah, it looks like I get bonused the amount you donate.
Oh, on my end, they didn't explain anything.
I think I've already broken the rules about what I am supposed to say. Mostly it gives me info on the charity.
Oh, it still would have been better if I had some information.  I was just put into a chat room with instructions about having a chat about a charity.
Kind of the same for me. But it looks like it's something to do with kids in Syria and refers me to the website.
I think I just didn't react to the little bit of instruction like they had anticipated.  Syria is a good one but I am a little worried about some kids in America, right now.
A lot of people care about the immigrants. The fact that the government actually listened to people complaining was interesting. I suppose they could have done nothing.
I think people are getting more and more involved, all of a sudden.  This country my have had its wake up call :)
History tends to repeat itself.
true.  only because we think of our ancestors as them instead of us.
